name: 3D Platform completion
description:
In the first level, the player-controlled robot wakes up in a lab, and the player steps out of the lab into a terrifying cave.There are many enemies in the cave, and the player needs to defeat the enemies to get to the next level.

In the second level, the player comes to a city occupied by the enemy, and the player is resurrected on the roof of a building. The player has to go through a lot of obstacles to get to the destination.

If you accidentally jump off the building, you'll have to use the Jumppad to get back to the top.So players need to try not to move down the roof.
